DBND is used for processes ranging from data ingestion, preparation, machine learning model training and production.DBND includes a Python library, set of APIs, and CLI that enables you to collect metadata from your workflows, create a system of record for runs, and easily orchestrate complex processes.DBND simplifies the process of building and running data pipelinesfrom dbnd import task```pythonfrom dbnd import task@taskdef say_hello(name: str = "databand.ai") -> str: value = "Hello %s!" % name return value```And makes it easy to track your critical pipeline metadata```pythonfrom dbnd import log_metric, log_dataframelog_dataframe("my_dataset", my_dataset)log_metric("r2", r2)```## Getting StartedSee our [documentation](https://docs.databand.ai/docs) with examples and quickstart guides to get up and running with DBND.## The Latest and GreatestFor using DBND, we recommend that you work with a virtual environment like [Virtualenv](https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/latest/) or [Conda](https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/). Update to the latest and greatest:```shell scriptpip install dbnd```If you would like access to our latest features, or have any questions, feedback, or contributions we would love to here from you!
